+    
+%define ACHAR         BYTE  ;ansi character
+%define ATOM          DWORD ;string atom
+%define BOOL          DWORD ;boolean variable
+%define COLORREF      DWORD ;rgb color
+%define DWORDLONG     QWORD ;long double word
+%define GLOBALHANDLE  DWORD ;global handle
+%define HACCEL        DWORD ;accelerator handle
+%define HANDLE        DWORD ;unspecified handle
+%define HBITMAP       DWORD ;bitmap handle
+%define HBRUSH        DWORD ;brush handle
+%define HCOLORSPACE   DWORD ;color space handle
+%define HCURSOR       DWORD ;cursor handle
+%define HDC           DWORD ;device context handle
+%define HDWP          DWORD ;defer win pos handle
+%define HENHMETAFILE  DWORD ;enh. metafile handle
+%define HFILE         DWORD ;file handle
+%define HFONT         DWORD ;font handle
+%define HGLOBAL       DWORD ;global handle
+%define HHOOK         DWORD ;hook handle
+%define HICON         DWORD ;icon handle
+%define HINSTANCE     DWORD ;instance handle
+%define HINTERNET     DWORD ;internet handle
+%define HLOCAL        DWORD ;local handle
+%define HMENU         DWORD ;menu handle
+%define HMETAFILE     DWORD ;metafile handle
+%define HPALETTE      DWORD ;palette handle
+%define HPEN          DWORD ;pen handle
+%define HRGN          DWORD ;region handle
+%define HRSRC         DWORD ;resource handle
+%define HSTR          DWORD ;string handle
+%define HTASK         DWORD ;task handle
+%define HTREEITEM     DWORD ;tree view item handle
+%define HWND          DWORD ;window handle
+%define INTEGER       DWORD ;standard integer
+%define LOCALHANDLE   DWORD ;local handle
+%define LONG          DWORD ;long integer
+%define LONGINT       DWORD ;long integer
+%define LPARAM        DWORD ;long parameter
+%define LPBOOL        DWORD ;long ptr to boolean
+%define LPBYTE        DWORD ;long ptr to byte
+%define LPCSTR        DWORD ;long ptr to string
+%define LPCTSTR       DWORD ;long ptr to string
+%define LPCVOID       DWORD ;long ptr to buffer
+%define LPDWORD       DWORD ;long ptr to dword
+%define LPFN          DWORD ;long ptr to function
+%define LPINT         DWORD ;long ptr to integer
+%define LPLONG        DWORD ;long ptr to long int
+%define LPMSG         DWORD ;long pointer to message
+%define LPPAINTSTRUCT DWORD ;long pointer to paint structure
+%define LPRECT        DWORD ;long pointer to rectangle
+%define LPSTR         DWORD ;long ptr to string

+%define UINT          DWORD ;unsigned integer

+; Return Codes
+;
+
+DS_OK                           EQU 0
+DSERR_ALLOCATED                 EQU  80000000h +_FACDS * 16 + 10      ;80000000h +( _FACDS shl 16) + 10
+DSERR_CONTROLUNAVAIL            EQU 80000000h + _FACDS * 16 + 30
+DSERR_INVALIDPARAM              EQU E_INVALIDARG
+DSERR_INVALIDCALL               EQU 80000000h +_FACDS * 16 + 50
+DSERR_GENERIC                   EQU E_FAIL
+DSERR_PRIOLEVELNEEDED           EQU 80000000h +_FACDS * 16 + 70
+DSERR_OUTOFMEMORY               EQU E_OUTOFMEMORY
+DSERR_BADFORMAT                 EQU 80000000h + _FACDS * 16 + 100
+DSERR_UNSUPPORTED               EQU E_NOTIMPL
+DSERR_NODRIVER                  EQU 80000000h + _FACDS * 16 + 120
+DSERR_ALREADYINITIALIZED        EQU 80000000h + _FACDS * 16 + 130
+DSERR_NOAGGREGATION             EQU CLASS_E_NOAGGREGATION
+DSERR_BUFFERLOST                EQU 80000000h + _FACDS * 16 + 150
+DSERR_OTHERAPPHASPRIO           EQU 80000000h + _FACDS * 16 + 160
+DSERR_UNINITIALIZED             EQU 80000000h + _FACDS * 16 + 170
+DSERR_NOINTERFACE               EQU E_NOINTERFACE

+;.MinorOperatingSystemVersion RESW 1

+    .wfx resb WAVEFORMATEX_size
+    .fwHeadLayer resb 1
+    .dwHeadBitrate resd 1
+    .fwHeadMode resb 1

+
+STRUC MPEGLAYER3WAVEFORMAT
+.wfx resb  WAVEFORMATEX_size
+.wID  resb 1
+.fdwFlags resd 1
+.nBlockSize resb 1
+.nFramesPerBlock resb 1
+.nCodecDelay resb 1
+ENDSTRUC
+
+;===================================================
+; WAVE_FORMAT_PCM   WAVEFORMATEX  = sizeof  = 0x12
+; MPEGLAYER3WAVEFORMAT mp3 ;    sizeof(mp3) = 0x1E
+; WAVE_FORMAT_MPEGLAYER3  cbFmt = sizeof(MPEGLAYER3WAVEFORMAT) = 0x1E
+; WAVE_FORMAT_ADPCM  cbFmt = 0x32
+
+;-----------------------------
+;  mp3format->wfx.cbSize = MPEGLAYER3_WFX_EXTRA_BYTES;
+;  mp3format->wfx.wFormatTag = WAVE_FORMAT_MPEGLAYER3;
+;  mp3format->wfx.nChannels = 2;
+;  mp3format->wfx.nAvgBytesPerSec = 128 * (1024 / 8);  // not really used but must be one of 64, 96, ;  112, 128, 160kbps
+;  mp3format->wfx.wBitsPerSample = 0;                  // MUST BE ZERO
+;  mp3format->wfx.nBlockAlign = 1;                     // MUST BE ONE
+;  mp3format->wfx.nSamplesPerSec = 44100;              // 44.1kHz
+;  mp3format->fdwFlags = MPEGLAYER3_FLAG_PADDING_OFF;
+;  mp3format->nBlockSize = MP3_BLOCK_SIZE;             // voodoo value #1
+;  mp3format->nFramesPerBlock = 1;                     // MUST BE ONE
+;  mp3format->nCodecDelay = 1393;                      // voodoo value #2
+;  mp3format->wID = MPEGLAYER3_ID_MPEG;
+;-------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+
+
+
+

+.Data1 resd 1
+.Data2 resw 1
+.Data3 resw 1
+.Data4 resb 8
+ENDSTRUC

+        .cAccumRedBits:         resb    1
+        .cAccumGreenBits:       resb    1
+        .cAccumBlueBits:        resb    1
+        .cAccumAlphaBits:       resb    1
+        .cDepthBits:            resb    1
+        .cStencilBits:          resb    1
+        .cAuxBuffers:           resb    1
+        .iLayerPlane:           resb    1
+        .bReserved:             resb    1
+        .crTransparent:         resd    1
+endstruc
+
+
+
+struc   USER_INFO_0
+        .usri0_name:    resd    1
+endstruc
+
+
+
+struc   LOCALGROUP_INFO_0
+        .lgrpi0_name:   resd    1
+endstruc
+

+  .iMaxSockets   RESW 1
+  .iMaxUdpDg     RESW 1
+  .lpVendorInfo  RESD 1
+ENDSTRUC

+STRUC st_mysql_field 
+	.name        resd 1        ; column name <PTR>
+	.table		resd 1		; table of column if col was field <PTR>
+	.def		resd 1	; defaults val (from mysql_list_fields) <PTR>
+	.type		resd 1	; type of field
+	.length	resd 1	; width
+	.max_length	resd 1		; max width of set
+	.flags		resd 1		; div flags
+	.decimals	resd 1		; no. of decimals in field
+ENDSTRUC

+; MACROS FROM NAGOA  for NASM 
+; version  date  :  14 Mar?o 2004  
+; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
+; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
+; 
+; pedrogc macros proc endproc stack  20-mar?o-2003 (undef resolved)  
+; nuMIT_or  PEMAC  only NASM  , adapted to NAGOA by PedroGC 10-fev-2004  
+; ADDR_   or  addr  or ADDR   ( lea eax , [xxx] )  LuckyStar  15- jan-2004
+; NPEMAC   ( nuMIT_or ) edit by PedroGC 12-fev-2004  (  %define ONLY_NASM )
+; pedrogc 14 march 2004  proc end proc stack new updated version    
+; pedrogc 14 march 2004 GUID_ macro
+;=====================================================================
+
+
+;========================================================
+;  for calling external function in dll?s or ocx
+;------------------------------------------------------------------------
+;   INVOKE or   invoke or STDCALL or stdcall  or CALL_  or call_
+;========================================================
+
+;%define call call_   ; remove this ! if you do not like call macro 
+
+;========================================================
+;
+;  example  
+;  invoke MessageBoxA,NULL,"Info to say","the title",MB_OK
+;  or
+;  stdcall MessageBoxA,NULL,"Info to say","the title",MB_OK
+;  or 
+;  call_   MessageBoxA,NULL,"Info to say","the title",MB_OK
+;
+;======================================================================
+;  local function    is  LOCCALL or loccall
+; =====================================================================
+;  
+;  loccall myMessage,"ola meu","my tiltle"
+;
+;======================================================================
+;  NEW MACRO CAN USE  * ADDR_ *   it will out put   LEA EAX,[var]   ,   push eax     
+;======================================================================
+; proc teste,ola
+;    
+;     stack opf, OPENFILENAME_size
+;
+;     call MessageBoxA , NULL,[ola],"title1",MB_OK
+;     call RtlZeroMemory,  ADDR_ opf   , OPENFILENAME_size      <-  LOOK HERE 
+;     mov dword [opf],OPENFILENAME_size 
+;     call  GetOpenFileName ,   ADDR_ opf                       <-  LOOK HERE 
+;     call ExitProcess,0
+;
+; endproc
+;
+;========================================================================
+
+
+;----------------------------------------------------------
+;db        = byte          1 Byte ( 8 Bit)
+;dw        = word          2 Byte (16 Bit)
+;dd        = doubleword    4 Byte (32 Bit)
+;----------------------------------------------------------
+
+;;=====pedrogc macros ==========================
+;------------------------------------------------
+; proc Funcion,arg1,..,argN
+;
+;   sectiondata
+;   var_1  dd 0
+;   var_2  dd 0
+;   sectioncode
+;    
+;    stack var1,4,msg,MSG_size,hWnd,4  ; locals using stack !
+;
+;  mov [hWnd],eax
+;
+;  
+;
+;  return           ; jump to endrotin
+;
+;  lea eax,[msg]
+;
+;  return 1        ;  jmp to endrotin and eax=1
+;
+;  mov eax,[arg1]
+;
+; endproc
+;-------------------------------------------------
+
+; dword = 4  ;)
+
+;-------------------------------------------------
+
+
+
+%MACRO pushd  1
+  push DWORD %1
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+ %MACRO popd 1
+  pop DWORD %1
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+ %MACRO pushb 1
+  push BYTE %1
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+ %MACRO movd 2
+  mov DWORD %1, %2
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+
+
+; ------- Segments Macros -------------------------------
+
+ %MACRO data32 0
+  section data class=data use32 align=16
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+ %MACRO _data 0
+  [segment .data use32]
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+ %MACRO code32 0
+  section code class=code use32 align=16
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+ %MACRO _code32 0
+  [segment .code use32]
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+ %MACRO bss32 0
+  section bss class=bss use32 align=16
+ %ENDMACRO
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+;;================================
+;; MACRO  str2int     int2str by Written by mastercpp.
+;;================================
+%macro str2int 1
+        push    ebx ;
+        push    esi ;
+        push    edi ;
+        mov ebx, 0
+        mov ecx, 0
+        xor eax,eax
+        mov ebx,0000000Ah
+        mov esi,offset %1
+        %%ConvertLoop
+        movzx ecx,byte [esi] ;Zeichen laden.
+        test ecx,ecx
+        jz  short %%ExitConvertLoop ;0 => Exit
+        inc esi
+        sub cl,30h ;0-9...
+        mul ebx ;Ergebnis * 10
+        add eax,ecx ;+ n?chste Ziffer
+        jmp short %%ConvertLoop
+        %%ExitConvertLoop
+        pop     edi
+        pop     esi
+        pop     ebx
+%endmacro
+
+%macro int2str 2
+        push    ebx ;
+        push    esi ;
+        push    edi ;
+        %%start
+        mov  eax, %1
+        xor  ecx, ecx
+        mov  ebx, 000ah
+        %%DecConvert
+        xor  edx,  edx
+        div  ebx
+        add  edx,  0030h
+        push edx
+        inc  ecx
+        or   eax,  eax
+        jnz  short %%DecConvert
+        mov  edi,  %2
+        %%SortDec
+        pop   eax
+        stosb
+        loop  %%SortDec
+        mov eax, 0h
+        stosb
+        pop     edi
+        pop     esi
+        pop     ebx
+%endmacro
+;;================================
+;; mastercpp  end macros
+;;================================
+
+
+;; -----------------------------------
+;; INPUT red, green & blue BYTE values
+;; OUTPUT DWORD COLORREF value in eax
+;; -----------------------------------
+;; using example:
+;;-----------------------------------
+;; RGB    200,200,50
+;;------------------------------------
+%macro RGB 3
+        xor eax, eax
+        mov ah, %3
+        shl eax, 8
+        mov ah, %2
+        mov al, %1
+%endmacro
+
+
+
+;=== HGB THANKS !
+%macro def 1
+        definir %1
+%endmacro
+
+%macro definir 1
+        %define %1_definida
+%endmacro
+;=============
+
+
+%imacro call_ 1-*  
+%assign i	%0
+	%if %0 > 1
+		%rep %0 - 1
+			%rotate -1  
+			%assign i	i-1		                               
+			%rotate -1
+			%ifidni %1,"ADDR_"
+			%rotate 1
+			lea	eax,	[%1]
+			push	eax
+			%rotate -1
+			%assign i	i-1
+			%else		
+			%rotate 1
+			STDPUSH {%1}     
+			%endif
+			%if i <=1
+			%exitrep
+			%endif
+		%endrep		
+		%rotate -1
+	%endif
+	%ifid %1
+		%ifdef %1_definida
+			;? uma  fun?ao local
+			CALL %1
+		%else
+			%ifdef ONLY_NASM
+				CALL [%1]
+			%else
+				extern %1
+				CALL [%1]
+			%endif
+		%endif
+	%else
+		CALL %1
+	%endif
+%endmacro
+
+
+
+;=== [ end macro call_ ] =====================
+
+
+
+;=================================================================
+; thanks Scali at #win32asm efnet for the help on this  by PedroGC
+;=================================================================
+;    mmioFOURCC,'W', 'A', 'V', 'E'               the result is in eax  =   EVAW
+;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+%macro mmioFOURCC 4
+%define ch0 %1
+%define ch1 %2
+%define ch2 %3
+%define ch3 %4
+    mov al, ch3
+    shl eax, 8
+    mov al, ch2
+    shl eax, 8
+    mov al, ch1
+    shl eax, 8
+    mov al, ch0
+%endmacro
+
+
+;-----to place constantes in side the code-------------------------
+;  EXAMPLE OF THIS
+;------------------------------------------------------------------
+;
+;   SomeRotine:
+;
+;      sectiondata
+;      hWnd2 dd 0
+;      hInst dd 0
+;      rect resb RECT_size
+;
+;      filtro:  db      "asm", 0,       "*.asm", 0
+;                   db  "inc", 0,       "*.inc", 0
+;                   db  "rc", 0,        "*.rc", 0
+;                   db  0,              0
+;      sectioncode
+;
+;
+;
+;
+;
+;   call GetWindowText, [hMainWin], ebx, MAX_PATH
+;       test    eax, eax
+;       jnz     .save
+;
+; filePrompt:
+;
+;  invoke       fselSelect, filtro, ebx, 0, 0, filtro
+;
+;------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+%define sectiondata [section data]
+%define sectioncode [section code]
+
+;------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+
+;---- means nothing in NASM --------
+%idefine offset
+;------------------------------------
+
+%imacro m2m 2
+push dword %2
+pop dword %1
+%endmacro
+
+;================================================================
+;  CALLCOM or callcom for COM calling   by PedroGC
+;================================================================
+;   USAGE :
+;================================================================
+; callcom ptObject,ptMethod,var1,...,var_n
+;================================================================
+%macro CALLCOM  2-*
+%define ptInterface %1
+%define method %2
+%rep %0-2
+%rotate -1
+push dword %1
+%endrep
+ mov  eax,   [ptInterface]                  ; pointer to the interface
+ mov  eax,   [eax]                            ; pointer to VTable [in DLL]
+ push dword [ptInterface]
+ CALL [eax+method]
+%endmacro
+
+
+%macro callcom  2-*
+%define ptInterface %1
+%define method %2
+%rep %0-2
+%rotate -1
+push dword %1
+%endrep
+ mov  eax,   [ptInterface]                  ; pointer to the interface
+ mov  eax,   [eax]                            ; pointer to VTable [in DLL]
+ push dword [ptInterface]
+ CALL [eax+method]
+%endmacro
+
+
+
+;================================================================
+;----------------------------------
+; CALL FOR COM OBJECTS !!!
+;-----------------------------------
+; macro COMCALL
+;----------------------------------
+; push dword varn
+;     .......
+; push dword var1
+; comcall object , method
+;            %1        %2
+;-----------------------------------
+;-----------------------------------
+%macro COMCALL 1-*
+mov eax,dword [%1]     ;mov eax, dword  [%1]
+push eax
+mov eax, dword  [eax]
+CALL [eax+%2]
+%endmacro
+
+%macro comcall 1-*
+mov eax,dword [%1]    ;mov eax, dword  [%1]
+push eax
+mov eax, dword  [eax]
+CALL [eax+%2]
+%endmacro
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+;****************************************************
+;                                       HLL macros
+;****************************************************
+;  - for/next
+;
+%imacro for 5
+        %push for
+        %define %$v %1
+        %define %$c %3
+        %define %$e %4
+        %define %$s %5
+        mov     %1, %2
+%$f:
+%endmacro
+%imacro next 0
+        %ifctx for
+                add     %$v, %$s
+                cmp     %$v, %$e
+                j%$c    near %$f
+                %pop
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'for' before 'next'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+;
+
+;
+; HLL macros - if/elseif/else/ifand/endif
+;
+%imacro if 3-*
+        %push if
+	%$if:
+	%assign %$i 1
+        %if %0 = 3
+                cmp     %1, %3
+                j%-2    near %$else_%$i
+        %else
+                %assign %$c 0
+                %rep (%0 / 3)
+                        cmp     %1,%3
+                        j%2     near %$c_%$i
+                        %rotate 3
+                %endrep
+                jmp     near %$else_%$i
+		%$c_%$i:
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+
+%imacro ifand 3-*
+        %push if
+	%$if:
+	%assign %$i 1
+        %if %0 = 3
+                cmp     %1, %3
+                j%-2    near %$else_%$i
+        %else
+                %rep (%0 / 3)
+                        cmp     %1, %3
+                        j%-2    near %$else_%$i
+                        %rotate 3
+                %endrep
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+
+%imacro elseif 3-*.nolist
+	%ifctx if
+		jmp	near %$endif
+		%$else_%$i:
+		%assign %$i %$i+1
+		%if %0=3
+			cmp %1,%3
+			j%-2 near %$else_%$i
+		%else		
+			%rep (%0 / 3)
+				cmp %1,%3
+				j%2 near %$c_%$i
+				%rotate 3
+			%endrep
+			jmp     near %$else_%$i
+			%$c_%$i:
+		%endif
+	%else
+		%error "'ELSEIF' can only be used following 'IF'"
+	%endif
+%endmacro
+
+
+%imacro else 0
+        %ifctx if
+                jmp     near %$endif
+                %$else_%$i:
+		%assign %$i %$i+1
+        %else
+                %error "Expected 'if' or 'ifand' before 'else'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro endif 0.nolist
+        %ifctx if
+		%$else_%$i:
+		%$endif:
+		%pop
+        %else
+                %error "Expected 'if' before 'endif'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+;***************************
+
+
+
+
+
+;***************************
+; HLL macros - repeat/until
+;
+%imacro repeat 0
+        %push repeat
+%$r:
+%endmacro
+%imacro until 3-*
+        %ifctx repeat
+                %if %0 = 3
+                        cmp     %1, %3
+                        j%-2    near %$r
+                %else
+                        %rep (%0 / 3)
+                                cmp     %1, %3
+                                j%-2    near %$r
+                                %rotate 3
+                        %endrep
+                %endif
+                %pop
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'repeat' before 'until'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro untiland 3-*
+        %ifctx repeat
+                %if %0 = 3
+                        cmp     %1, %3
+                        j%-2    near %$r
+                %else
+                        %rep (%0 / 3)
+                                cmp     %1, %3
+                                j%2     near %$x
+                                %rotate 3
+                        %endrep
+                        jmp     %$r
+                        %$x:
+                %endif
+                %pop
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'repeat' before 'untiland'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+
+;****************************************
+; HLL macros - switch
+;
+%imacro switch 1
+        %push switch
+        %define %$v %1
+        %assign %$c 0
+%endmacro
+%imacro case 1-*
+        %ifctx switch
+                %$s%$c:
+                %assign %$c %$c + 1
+                %if %0 = 1
+                        cmp     %$v, %1
+                        jne     near %$s%$c
+                %else
+                        %rep %0
+                                cmp     %$v, %1
+                                je      near %$sc%$c
+                                %rotate 1
+                        %endrep
+                        jmp     %$s%$c
+                        %$sc%$c:
+                %endif
+                %repl case
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'switch' before 'case' or missing 'break' in previous 'case'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro caseand 1-*
+        %ifctx switch
+                %$s%$c:
+                %assign %$c %$c + 1
+                %if %0 = 1
+                        cmp     %$v, %1
+                        jne     near %$s%$c
+                %else
+                        %rep %0
+                                cmp     %$v, %1
+                                jne     near %$s%$c
+                                %rotate 1
+                        %endrep
+                %endif
+                %repl case
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'switch' before 'caseand' or missing 'break' in previous 'case'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro range 2-*
+        %ifctx switch
+                %if %0 = 2
+                        %$s%$c:
+                        %assign %$c %$c + 1
+                        cmp     %$v, %1
+                        jl      near %$s%$c
+                        cmp     %$v, %2
+                        jg      near %$s%$c
+                %else
+                        %$s%$c:
+                        %assign %$c %$c + 1
+                        %assign %$d 100
+                        %rep (%0 / 2)
+                                        cmp     %$v, %1
+                                        jl      %$sr%$d
+                                        cmp     %$v, %2
+                                        jle     near %$sre%$c
+                                %$sr%$d:
+                                %assign %$d %$d + 1
+                                %rotate 2
+                        %endrep
+                        jmp     %$s%$c
+                        %$sre%$c:
+                %endif
+                %repl case
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'switch' before 'range' or missing 'break' in previous 'case'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro rangeand 2-*
+        %ifctx switch
+                %if %0 = 2
+                        %$s%$c:
+                        %assign %$c %$c + 1
+                        cmp     %$v, %1
+                        jl      near %$s%$c
+                        cmp     %$v, %2
+                        jg      near %$s%$c
+                %else
+                        %$s%$c:
+                        %assign %$c %$c + 1
+                        %rep (%0 / 2)
+                                        cmp     %$v, %1
+                                        jl      near %$s%$c
+                                        cmp     %$v, %2
+                                        jg      near %$s%$c
+                                %rotate 2
+                        %endrep
+                %endif
+                %repl case
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'switch' before 'rangeand' or missing 'break' in previous 'case'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro break 0
+        %ifctx case
+                jmp     %$e
+                %repl switch
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'case' before 'break'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro default 0
+        %ifctx switch
+                %$s%$c:
+                %assign %$c %$c + 1
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'switch' before 'default'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro switchend 0
+        %ifctx switch
+                %$e:
+                %$s%$c:
+                %pop
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'switch' before 'switchend'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+
+
+;*************************************************
+; HLL macros - while/wend
+;
+%imacro while 3-*
+        %push while
+        %$w:
+        %if %0 = 3
+                cmp     %1, %3
+                j%-2    near %$x
+        %else
+                %assign %$c 0
+                %rep (%0 / 3)
+                        cmp     %1, %3
+                        j%2     near %$w%$c
+                        %rotate 3
+                %endrep
+                jmp     %$x
+                %$w%$c:
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro whileand 3-*
+        %push while
+        %$w:
+        %if %0 = 3
+                cmp     %1, %3
+                j%-2    near %$x
+        %else
+                %assign %$c 0
+                %rep (%0 / 3)
+                        cmp     %1, %3
+                        j%-2    near %$x
+                        %rotate 3
+                %endrep
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+%imacro wend 0
+        %ifctx while
+                jmp     %$w
+        %$x:
+                %pop
+        %else
+                ; %error "Expected 'while' before 'wend'"
+        %endif
+%endmacro
+
+;****************************************************
+;            end                HLL macros
+;****************************************************
+
+
+
+
+
+
+; ----  Anton Eremeev  edit PedroGC
+
+;=====================================================
+ %imacro CONST 2+	; macro to insert constant into code
+	jmp near %%skip	; jump to macro-local label
+	%1 %2		; mark label and define data
+	%%skip:		; macro-local label
+ %endm
+;======================================================
+
+
+
+
+%macro STDPUSH 1				; macro to push argument list
+	%ifnum %1				; argument is a number
+						; check number to fit in signed byte
+		%if %1 >= -128 && %1 <= 127
+			push byte %1
+		%else				; cannot be pushed as signed byte
+			push dword %1
+		%endif
+	%else					; argument is not a number
+		%ifstr %1			; argument is a string
+			CONST %%str, db %1, 0	; define macro-local label
+			push dword %%str
+		%else				; neither string nor number (label or register)
+			push dword %1
+		%endif
+	%endif
+%endmacro
+
+
+
+
+
+; -------> FOR WIN32API use : call or stdcall or invoke
+%imacro ccall 1-*.nolist
+	%push ccall
+	%assign %$i %0-1
+	%assign %$params %0-1
+	%rep %0-1
+		%rotate -1  
+			%assign %$i	%$i-1
+			%rotate -1
+			%ifidni %1,"ADDR_"
+				%rotate 1
+				lea eax,[%1]
+				push eax
+				%rotate -1
+				%assign %$i %$i-1
+				%assign %$params %$params-1
+			%else		
+				%rotate 1
+				STDPUSH {%1}
+			%endif
+			%if %$i=0
+				%exitrep
+			%endif
+	%endrep
+	%rotate -1
+	%ifid %1
+		%ifdef %1_definida
+			CALL %1
+			%assign %$params %$params*4
+			add esp,%$params
+		%else
+			%ifdef ONLY_NASM
+				CALL [%1]
+			%else
+				extern %1
+				CALL [%1]
+			%endif
+			%assign %$params %$params*4
+			add esp,%$params
+		%endif
+	%else
+		CALL	%1
+		%assign %$params %$params*4
+		add esp,%$params
+	%endif
+	%pop
+%endmacro
+
+
+
+;------------- for internal local functions
+
+
+;=============== [ LOCAL FUNCTIONS   *LOCCALL* ] =====
+; examples :
+; loccall LocalFunction,ADDR_ msg
+; loccall Message,  " Some Text " , " title "
+;
+;======================================= 
+
+%imacro loccall 1-*  
+%assign i	%0
+	%if %0 > 1
+		%rep %0 - 1
+			%rotate -1  
+			%assign i	i-1
+			; ===== ADDR_
+			%rotate -1
+			%ifidni %1,"ADDR_"
+				%rotate 1
+				lea	eax,	[%1]
+				push	eax
+				%rotate -1
+				%assign i	i-1
+			%else		
+				%rotate 1
+				STDPUSH {%1}
+			%endif
+			
+
+			%if i <=1
+				%exitrep
+			%endif
+		%endrep		
+		%rotate -1
+	%endif  
+	CALL %1
+%endmacro
+;===================== [ LOCAL FUNCTIONS END *LOCCALL* ]
+
+
+
+;========= nuMIT_or MACROS 
+
+; ------------------ 
+; DO_UNICODE macro
+; ------------------
+%macro DO_UNICODE 1
+ %assign  %%a 0
+ %assign  %%b 0
+ %strlen  %%b %1
+ %assign  %%c 1
+ %assign  %%d 0
+ %rep     %%b
+  %substr  %%a %1 %%c
+  %if %%d=0
+    %ifidn %%a, '/'
+        %assign %%d 1
+    %else
+      DW %%a
+    %endif
+  %else
+    %assign %%d 0
+    %ifidn %%a, '/'
+      DW '/'
+    %elifidn %%a, 'n'
+      DW 0Dh, 0Ah
+    %elifidn %%a, 'r'
+      DW 0Dh
+    %elifidn %%a, 'l'
+      DW 0Ah
+    %elifidn %%a, 's'
+      DW 20h
+    %elifidn %%a, 'c'
+      DW 3Bh
+    %elifidn %%a, 't'
+      DW 09h
+    %elifidn %%a, '0'
+      DW 0
+    %elifidn %%a, '1'
+      DW 1
+    %else
+      DW '/', %%a
+    %endif
+  %endif
+  %assign %%c %%c+1
+ %endrep
+%endmacro
+; ----------------------------
+; macro: DO_UNICODEZ
+; ----------------------------
+%macro DO_UNICODEZ 1
+ DO_UNICODE %1
+ set_wzero 
+%endmacro
+; ----------------------------
+; set_wchar macro
+; ----------------------------
+%macro set_wchar 1
+  DW %1
+%endmacro
+; ----------------------------
+; set_wzero macro
+; ----------------------------
+%define set_wzero DW 0
+; ----------------------------
+; TEXTW macro
+; ----------------------------
+%macro TEXTW 2
+ %strlen %%a %2
+ align 2, DB 0
+ %1:
+    s%1 EQU %1
+    DO_UNICODEZ %2
+    L%1 EQU %%a
+%endmacro
+; ----------------------------
+; TEXTA macro
+; ----------------------------
+%macro TEXTA 2
+ %strlen %%a %2
+ align 1, DB 0
+ %1:
+    s%1 EQU %1
+    ATEXT %2
+    L%1 EQU %%a
+%endmacro
+
+
+; ----------------------------
+; PushStr macro
+; ----------------------------
+%macro	PushStr 1+
+ CALL	%%a
+ DB	%1, 0
+ ALIGN  4, DB 0
+%%a
+%endmacro
+; ----------------------------
+; PushUStr macro
+; ----------------------------
+%macro  PushUStr 1+
+ CALL	%%a
+    DO_UNICODEZ %1
+%%a
+%endmacro
+; ----------------------------
+; pushn macro
+; ----------------------------
+%macro pushn 1
+ lea  eax, %1
+ push eax
+%endmacro
+; ----------------------------
+; SZSTRING macro
+; ----------------------------
+%macro	SZSTRING 2
+	CALL	%%a
+	%1 db %2, 0
+	%%a
+%endmacro
+
+;========= nuMIT_or MACROS END
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+; :::: PE MACROS   nguga ::::::::::::::
+;===========================================
+
+%macro IMPORT_END 0-*  
+_end_import:
+%define	import_size _end_import - import
+end
+%endmacro
+
+%define IMPORT_BEGIN section .text
+
+%define LAST_BEGIN    section .text
+%define LAST_END       IMPORT_END
+
+; :::::::: end PE macros nguga ::::::::::::::::
+
+
+
+
+
+;======= GUID_   macro by PedroGC =====
+%macro GUID_ 0-*
+%1:
+ISTRUC GUID
+AT GUID.Data1 , dd %2     ;56FDF344h
+AT GUID.Data2 , dw %3    ;0FD6Dh
+AT GUID.Data3 ,	dw %4   ;11D0h
+AT GUID.Data4 , db %5     ;{95h,8Ah,0,60h,97h,0C9h,0A0h,90h}
+IEND
+%endmacro
+;================================
+; example declaring a GUID with this macro
+;
+; GUID_ IID_ITaskbarList , 56fdf342h ,0FD6Dh,11D0h,{95h,8Ah,0,60h,97h,0C9h,0A0h,90h}
+;===================================================================================
+
+;===============================================
+;  PROC ENDPROC  and STACK locals  by PedroGC
+;____________________________________________________
+; proc	funcao3,arg_1,arg_2,arg_3
+;
+;	         stack	hwnd,4,msg,MSG_size,var_3,10
+;
+;mov eax,[@hwnd]
+;mov eax,[@msg]
+;  return                ; go to end of proc
+;
+;mov eax,[@var_3]
+;mov eax,[@arg_1]
+;
+;return TRUE         ; go to end of proc and  eax = 1
+;
+;mov eax,[@arg_2]
+;mov eax,[@arg_3]
+;endproc	funcao3
+;--------------------------------------------------------------
+;                                   dword = 4 
+;=================================================
+%imacro proc 1-*.nolist
+	%assign SizeLocalAdd 0  ; inicializar o size das locais a zero
+	%assign stack_var  1     ; inicializar a stack pra primeira  variavel declarada
+	%assign c_l 1  ; INICILIZAR OS ARGUMENTOS PARA O PRIMEIRO !
+	%assign n_l %0-1
+	%assign numarg_ %0-1   ; para fazer ret final
+	%define nome_rotina %1
+
+	%push proc
+	global %1
+	%1:
+	push ebp
+	mov ebp,esp
+	;== loop para defenir parametros
+	%rep %0-1
+		%rotate 1
+		%xdefine @%1  ebp+4 +c_l*4 
+		%assign c_l c_l+1
+	%endrep      
+	;=== loop end  para defenir parametros
+%endmacro
+;; ==================
+
+;---
+;Usage: proc Function
+;            uses edi,esi,"C"
+;       endproc
+;Saves the register at start of proc and retains at the end of function
+;automatically. Also it makes a proc, a C proc too. 
+;---
+%imacro uses 1-*.nolist
+	%ifctx proc
+		%push uses
+		%assign %$j 1
+		%assign %$count %0
+		%rep %0
+			%ifstr %1
+				%ifidni %1,"C"
+					%define __ at CFunction
+					%assign %$count %$count-1
+					%rotate 1
+				%endif
+			%else
+				%xdefine %$reg_%$j %1
+				push dword %1
+				%assign %$j %$j+1
+				%rotate 1
+			%endif
+		%endrep
+	%else
+		%error "'USES' must be used inside 'PROC/ENDPROC'"
+	%endif
+%endmacro
+
+
+;======================
+; START STACK  LOCALS
+;======================
+; tipo par de argumentos sem fim
+; stack var1,4,var2,4,msg,28
+;======================
+
+%imacro stack 1-*.nolist
+	%ifctx proc
+		%assign %%pare_Argts ((%0) / 2)
+		%assign _SomaDasLocais_ 0
+		%rep %%pare_Argts
+			%assign SizeLocalAdd SizeLocalAdd +%2
+			%xdefine @%1 ebp-SizeLocalAdd 
+			%assign stack_var stack_var+1          
+			%assign _SomaDasLocais_ _SomaDasLocais_ +%2
+			%rotate 2
+		%endrep        ; end loop para defenir parametros
+		sub esp , _SomaDasLocais_
+	%endif
+%endmacro
+
+
+
+;=====================
+;  END STACK LOCALS
+;=====================
+%imacro endproc 0-1.nolist
+	terminar_ nome_rotina
+	%ifctx uses
+		%assign %$j %$j-1
+		%rep %$count
+			pop dword %$reg_%$j
+			%assign %$j %$j-1
+		%endrep
+		%pop
+	%endif
+	%ifctx proc
+		leave
+		%ifdef __ at CFunction
+			ret
+		%else
+			%if numarg_
+				ret 4*numarg_
+			%else
+				ret
+			%endif
+		%endif
+		%pop
+	%endif
+%endmacro
+
+;; ==========_ret  ========================
+;; return macro  , can only be used in proc endproc
+;; ======================================
+%imacro  return  0-1.nolist
+	%if %0
+		%if %1=1
+			xor     eax, eax
+			inc     eax
+		%elif %1=0
+			xor     eax, eax
+		%else
+			mov eax, %1
+		%endif
+	%endif
+	l_ret_l
+%endmacro
+
+%macro terminar_ 1
+        %1terminar_:
+%endmacro
+%macro _brincar 2
+             jmp near %1%2
+%endmacro
+%macro l_ret_l 0
+            _brincar nome_rotina,terminar_
+%endmacro
+;===== undef resolved  =============================
+;; PROC END PROC and STACK locals macros by Nguga
+;;==============================================
\ No newline at end of file

Added: trunk/gpt2/test/asm/win32/teste.asm
===================================================================
--- trunk/gpt2/test/asm/win32/teste.asm	2007-10-30 13:05:32 UTC (rev 329)
+++ trunk/gpt2/test/asm/win32/teste.asm	2007-10-30 19:23:58 UTC (rev 330)
@@ -0,0 +1,1260 @@
+%define ONLY_NASM
+%include "header.asm"
+;%include "nagoa+.inc"
+
+%macro  begin 1
+    push    ebp 
+    mov     ebp,esp
+  %if %1
+    sub     esp,%1
+  %endif
+%endmacro
+
+%macro mreturn 0
+    mov esp, ebp
+    pop ebp  
+    ret
+%endmacro
+
+%macro addarg 1
+    push %1
+%endmacro
+
+%macro clargs 1
+    add esp, 4 * %1
+%endmacro
+
+
+%macro exit 1
+	wcall	ExitProcess, %1
+%endmacro
+
+%macro print_lf 0
+  addarg 10
+  call __print_c
+  clargs 1
+%endmacro
+
+;--------------------------------------
+%define MEMORY_SIZE  1048576
+%define BUFFER_SIZE  1024
+
+section .bss
+    __mem    resb  MEMORY_SIZE
+
+section .data
+    __mem_ptr   dd 0
+
+    __str_true  db 'verdadeiro',0
+    __str_false db 'falso',0
+    __str_no_mem_left db 'N?o foi poss?vel alocar mem?ria.',0
+
+    
+	msg:	 dw	2213
+	handle:	 db	0
+	written: db	0		
+	read   : db 0
+	stdin  : dd 0;sizeof(handle) == 4 (dword)
+	stdout : dd 0;sizeof(handle) == 4 (dword)
+	baffer : db 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx@',0
+	
+section .text
+__start:
+
+
+	
+    wcall GetStdHandle, -10
+    mov [stdin], eax    
+
+    wcall GetStdHandle, -11
+	mov [stdout], eax    
+	        
+    wcall ReadConsoleA, [stdin], baffer, 1024, read, 0
+    
+
+    wcall WriteConsoleA, [stdout], baffer, 20, written, 0
+		
+	exit 0
+	
+;--------------------
+
+__imprima_literal:
+    %define string ebp+8
+    begin 0
+
+    mov eax, [string]
+    cmp eax, 0
+    jz .end
+
+    addarg dword [string]
+    call __print
+    clargs 1
+
+    print_lf
+
+    .end
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+__imprima_inteiro:
+    ;params
+    %define num ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define buffer   ebp-BUFFER_SIZE
+    begin BUFFER_SIZE
+    
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg dword [num]    
+    call __itoa
+    clargs 2
+
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    call __print
+    clargs 1
+
+    print_lf
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__imprima_real:
+    ;params
+    %define num ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define buffer   ebp-BUFFER_SIZE
+    begin BUFFER_SIZE
+
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg dword [num]    
+    call __ftoa
+    clargs 2
+
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    call __print
+    clargs 1
+
+    print_lf
+
+    mreturn
+  
+__print_c:
+    ;params
+    %define carac ebp+8
+
+    begin 0
+
+    lea eax, [carac]
+    addarg eax
+    call __print
+    clargs 1
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__imprima_caractere:
+    ;params 
+    %define carac ebp+8
+    begin 4
+    
+    addarg dword [carac]
+    call __print_c
+    clargs 1
+
+    print_lf
+    
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__imprima_logico:
+    ;params 
+    %define val ebp+8
+
+    begin 0
+
+    mov eax, [val]
+    cmp eax, 0
+    jz .false
+    mov eax, __str_true
+    jmp .print
+
+    .false:
+      mov eax, __str_false
+
+    .print:
+      addarg eax
+      call __print
+      clargs 1
+
+      print_lf
+  
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__strpos:
+    ;params
+    %define string ebp+12
+    %define carac  ebp+8
+
+    begin 0
+
+    mov eax, [string]
+    cmp eax, 0
+    jnz .calc
+
+    mov eax, 0
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+    .calc:
+      mov eax, 0
+      .do:
+        mov ebx, [string]
+        mov ecx, [carac]
+        cmp [ebx+eax], cl
+        jz  .break
+
+        cmp [ebx+eax], byte 0
+        jz .notfound
+
+        inc eax
+        jnz .do
+      .break:
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+    .notfound
+      mov eax, -1
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+__strlen:
+    ;params
+    %define string ebp+8
+
+    begin 0
+
+    addarg dword [string]
+    addarg 0
+    call __strpos
+    clargs 2
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__print:
+	%define STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE -11
+	
+    ;params
+    %define string ebp+8
+
+    %define handle  ebp-4
+    %define length  ebp-8    
+    begin 8
+    
+	wcall	GetStdHandle, STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE
+	mov		[handle], eax
+
+	addarg dword [string]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+    mov [length], eax
+
+
+    wcall WriteConsoleA, [handle], [string], [length], 0, 0
+ 
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__is_num:
+    ;params
+    %define carac ebp+8
+
+    begin 0
+
+    cmp byte  [carac], 48
+    jl .false
+
+    cmp byte [carac], 57
+    jg .false
+
+    mov eax, 1
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+    .false:
+      mov eax, 0
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+__atoi:
+    ;params
+    %define string ebp+8
+  
+    ;locals
+    %define num   ebp-4
+    %define m     ebp-8
+    %define i     ebp-12
+    %define len   ebp-16
+    %define negt  ebp-20
+    begin 20
+  
+    mov dword [num], 0
+    mov dword [m], 1
+  
+    addarg dword [string]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+
+    cmp eax, dword 0
+    jz .ret_zero
+
+    mov dword [len], eax
+    mov dword [i], 0
+
+    ;checks for signal (+-)
+    %define minus_sig 45 
+    %define plus_sig 43
+    mov eax, [string]
+    xor ebx, ebx
+    mov bl, [eax]
+
+    cmp ebx, minus_sig
+    jz .negative
+
+    cmp ebx, plus_sig
+    jz .positive
+
+    jmp .conv
+
+    .negative
+      mov dword [negt], 1
+      mov eax, [string]
+      inc eax
+      mov [string], eax
+      jmp .conv
+
+    .positive
+      mov dword [negt], 0
+      mov eax, [string]
+      inc eax
+      mov [string], eax
+
+  .conv:
+
+    mov eax, [len]
+    .while:
+      mov eax, dword [i]
+      cmp eax, [len]
+      jg .endwhile      
+      
+      mov ebx, [string]
+      mov ecx, [i]        
+      xor edx, edx
+      mov dl, [ebx+ecx]      
+
+      addarg edx
+      call __is_num
+      clargs 1
+  
+      cmp eax, 0
+      jz .endwhile
+  
+      inc dword [i]
+      jmp .while
+    .endwhile:
+  
+    cmp dword [i], 0
+    jz .ret_zero
+  
+
+    dec dword [i]    
+    
+    .while2:
+      cmp dword [i], 0
+      jl .endwhile2
+
+      ; get the string[len-i]  
+      mov ebx, [string]
+      mov ecx, [i]
+      xor eax, eax
+      mov al, byte [ebx+ecx]
+
+      ;(string[len-i] - 48) * m
+      sub al, 48
+
+      mul dword [m]      
+
+      ;num += (string[len-i] - 48) * m
+      add [num], eax
+
+      dec dword [i]
+
+      ;m *= 10
+      mov eax, [m]
+      mov ebx, 10
+      mul ebx
+      mov [m], eax
+
+      jmp .while2
+    .endwhile2:
+  
+    cmp dword [negt], 1
+    jnz .mreturn_pos
+mreturn
+    mov eax, [num]
+    neg eax
+    mreturn
+   
+    .mreturn_pos
+      mov eax, [num]
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+    .ret_zero
+      mov eax, 0
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+__atof:
+    ;params
+    %define string ebp+8
+
+    ;locals
+    %define negt     ebp-4
+    %define dotpos   ebp-8
+    %define declen   ebp-12
+    %define str_dec  ebp-16
+    %define inte     ebp-20
+    %define deci     ebp-24
+    %define p        ebp-28
+    %define float    ebp-32
+    
+    begin 32
+
+    addarg dword [string]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+
+    cmp eax, dword 0
+    jz .ret_zero
+
+    ;checks for signal (+-)
+    %define minus_sig 45 
+    %define plus_sig 43
+    mov eax, [string]
+    xor ebx, ebx
+    mov bl, [eax]
+
+    cmp ebx, minus_sig
+    jz .negative
+
+    cmp ebx, plus_sig
+    jz .positive
+
+    jmp .conv
+
+    .negative
+      mov dword [negt], 1
+      mov eax, [string]
+      inc eax
+      mov [string], eax
+      jmp .conv
+
+    .positive
+      mov dword [negt], 0
+      mov eax, [string]
+      inc eax
+      mov [string], eax
+
+  .conv:
+
+    addarg dword [string]
+    addarg '.'
+    call __strpos
+    clargs 2
+    
+    mov dword [dotpos], eax
+
+    ;get decimal str
+    mov eax, [string]
+    add eax, [dotpos]
+    inc eax
+
+    mov [str_dec], eax
+
+    addarg dword [str_dec]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+    
+    mov dword [declen], eax    
+
+    addarg dword [str_dec]
+    call __atoi
+    clargs 1
+
+    mov dword [deci], eax
+
+    mov eax, [string]
+    add eax, [dotpos]
+    mov [eax], byte 0
+
+    addarg dword [string]
+    call __atoi
+    clargs 1
+
+    mov [inte], eax
+
+    mov eax, dword [declen]
+    
+    addarg 10
+    addarg eax
+    call __pow
+    clargs 2
+
+    mov dword [p], eax
+
+    finit
+    fld   dword [deci]
+    fdiv  dword [p]
+    fiadd  dword [inte]
+    fstp  dword [float]
+
+    cmp dword [negt], 1
+    jnz .mreturn_pos
+mreturn
+    mov eax, [float]
+    or eax, 0x80000000
+    mreturn
+   
+    .mreturn_pos
+      mov eax, [float]
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+    .ret_zero
+      mov eax, 0
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+    exit 0
+
+__itoa:
+    ;params
+    %define buffer ebp+12
+    %define num ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define sig ebp-4
+    begin 4
+
+    ;sig = (num >> 31);
+    mov eax, [num]
+    mov [sig], eax
+    shr eax, 31
+    mov [sig], eax    
+
+    cmp [sig], dword 0
+    jz .endif
+      neg dword [num]
+    .endif:
+
+    
+    mov ecx, 0
+    mov eax, [num] ;123
+    .trans
+      mov ebx, 10
+      mov edx, 0
+      idiv ebx   ;edx:eax / op: 123 / 10 -- eax = 12, edx = 3
+      add edx, byte 48
+      push edx
+      inc ecx ;update stack size
+    cmp eax, 0
+    jnz .trans
+
+    
+    cmp [sig], dword 0
+    jz .else1
+      %define minus_sig 45
+      mov edx, 1 ;addr offset
+      mov eax, [buffer]
+      mov [eax], byte minus_sig            
+      jmp .endif1
+    .else1:
+      mov edx, 0 ;addr offset
+    .endif1
+    
+    .reorder
+      pop eax
+      mov ebx, [buffer]
+      mov [ebx+edx], eax ;[buffer+offset]
+      dec ecx ;alg counter--
+      inc edx ;offset++
+    cmp ecx, 0 ;alg counter == 0? leave : reorder
+    jnz .reorder
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__ftoa:
+    %define BIAS 127
+
+    ;params
+    %define buffer ebp+12
+    %define num ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define exp    ebp-4
+    %define mant   ebp-8
+    %define left   ebp-12
+    %define sig    ebp-16    
+    %define offset ebp-20
+    %define r      ebp-24
+    %define term   ebp-28
+    %define acc    ebp-32
+    %define tmp    ebp-36
+    %define right  ebp-40
+    ;last ebp localvar offset
+    %define lst    40    
+  
+    begin lst
+
+    ;sig = (num >> 31);
+    mov eax, [num]
+    mov [sig], eax
+    shr eax, 31
+    mov [sig], eax
+
+    ;num = num & 0x7FFFFFFF;
+    mov eax, [num]
+    and eax, 0x7FFFFFFF
+    mov [num], eax
+
+    ;exp = num >> 23;
+    mov eax, [num]
+    shr eax, 23
+    mov [exp], eax
+
+    ;mant = num & 0x7FFFFF;
+    mov eax, [num]
+    and eax, 0x7FFFFF
+    mov [mant], eax
+
+    ;if((exp | mant) == 0) mreturn "0.0";
+    mov eax, [exp]      
+    mov ebx, [mant]
+    or eax, ebx      
+      cmp eax, 0
+      jnz .endif
+      mov eax, 0x00302E30 ;"0.0"
+      jmp .end
+    .endif:
+
+    ;exp -= BIAS;
+    sub [exp], dword BIAS
+  
+    ;mant |= 0x800000;       //+ hidden (1.)
+    or [mant], dword 0x800000
+
+    ;if(((24+1)-exp) < 32) { //not sure if this is right (ocurrs on 0.001)
+    ;  left = mant >> ((24-1)-exp);//24 - (hidden) - exp
+    ;} else {
+    ;  left = 0;
+    ;}
+    mov eax, 25
+    sub eax, [exp]
+      cmp eax, 32
+      jg .else1   
+      mov eax, [mant]
+      mov ecx, 23
+      sub ecx, [exp]
+      shr eax, cl
+      mov [left], eax
+      jmp .endif1
+    .else1:
+      mov [left], dword 0
+    .endif1:
+
+    ;if(8 + 1 + exp > 0) {//not sure about this eighter
+    ;  mant = mant << (8 + 1 + exp); //hidden + exp
+    ;} else { 
+    ;  exp *= -1;
+    ;  mant = mant >> (exp - (8+1));
+    ;}
+    mov eax, 9
+    add eax, [exp]
+      cmp eax, 0
+      jl .else2
+      mov ecx, 9
+      add ecx, [exp]
+      mov eax, [mant]
+      shl eax, cl
+      mov [mant], eax
+      jmp .endif2
+    .else2:
+      mov ecx, [exp]
+      sub ecx, 9
+      mov eax, [mant]
+      shr eax, cl          
+    .endif2:
+
+
+    ;int offset = 31;
+    mov [offset], dword 31
+
+    ;int r = mant;
+    mov eax, [mant]
+    mov [r], eax
+
+    ;int term = 1;
+    mov [term], dword 1
+
+    ;double acc = 0;
+    mov [acc], dword 0
+
+
+    finit
+
+    ;while(offset != 1) {  
+    .while:    
+      mov eax, [offset]
+      cmp eax, 1
+      jz .endwhile
+  
+      ;if((r >> offset) & 1) {
+      mov eax, [r]
+      mov ecx, [offset]
+      shr eax, cl
+      and eax, 1
+        cmp eax, 0
+        jz .endif3
+  
+        ;acc += pow(2, -(term));
+        mov eax, 2
+        mov ebx, [term]
+        neg ebx
+
+        addarg eax
+        addarg ebx
+        call __pow ;res on eax
+        clargs 2
+
+        mov [tmp], eax
+  
+        fld  dword [acc] ;st0 = acc      
+        fadd dword [tmp]
+        fstp dword [acc]
+      .endif3:
+
+      ;term++;
+      inc dword [term]
+
+      ;offset--;
+      dec dword [offset]
+      jmp .while
+    .endwhile:
+
+    finit
+
+    ;;acc *=100;
+    fld dword [acc] ;st0 = acc
+    mov [tmp], dword 100
+    fimul dword [tmp]
+    ;round acc
+    frndint
+    ;get the integer part and put it on acc
+    fist dword [acc]
+
+    mov eax, [acc]
+    mov [right], eax
+
+
+    ;create string "left.[0]right"
+
+    cmp [sig], dword 0
+    jz .endif5
+      neg dword [left]
+    .endif5:
+
+    addarg dword [buffer]
+    addarg dword [left]
+    call __itoa
+    clargs 2
+    ;buffer has "left"
+    
+    addarg dword [buffer]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+
+    add eax, dword [buffer]
+    mov [eax], byte '.'
+    inc eax
+    mov [tmp], eax    
+
+    ;make room
+    %define buffer2 ebp-lst+4
+    %define bfsize  1024
+    sub  esp, bfsize
+
+    addarg dword [buffer2]
+    addarg dword [right]
+    call __itoa
+    clargs 2
+    ;buffer2 has "right"
+
+    addarg dword [buffer2]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+
+    ;check if decimal has 2 digits
+    cmp eax, 2
+    jz .endif4
+      %define zero 48
+      xor eax, eax
+      mov ebx, [buffer2]
+      mov al, [ebx]
+      mov [ebx], byte zero
+      mov byte [ebx+1], al
+    .endif4:
+
+    mov eax, [buffer2]
+    mov ebx, [tmp]
+    .append:
+      cmp [eax], byte 0
+      jz .endappend
+      
+      xor ecx, ecx
+      mov cl, [eax]
+      mov [ebx], cl
+      inc eax
+      inc ebx
+      jmp .append
+    .endappend:
+
+    mov [ebx], byte 0
+
+  .end
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__pow:
+    ;params
+    %define base ebp+12
+    %define exp  ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define res  ebp-4
+    %define i    ebp-8
+    %define sig  ebp-12
+    %define tmp  ebp-16
+    begin 14
+
+    ;int neg = exp < 0;
+    mov eax, [exp]
+    mov ecx, 31
+    shr eax, cl
+    mov [sig], eax
+
+
+    ;if(neg) exp *= -1;
+    mov eax, [sig]
+    cmp eax, 0
+    jz .endif
+      mov eax, [exp]
+      neg eax
+      mov [exp], eax
+    .endif:
+
+    ;res = 1;
+    mov [res], dword 1
+
+    ;for(i = 0; i < exp; i++) {
+    mov [i], dword 0
+    .while:
+      mov eax, [i]
+      cmp eax, [exp]
+      jge .endwhile
+
+      ;res *= base;
+      mov eax, [res]
+      mul dword [base]
+      mov [res], eax
+
+      ;i++
+      inc dword [i]
+      jmp .while
+    .endwhile:
+
+    ;if(neg) res = 1.0 / res;
+    cmp [sig], dword 0
+    jz .noneg
+    .negative:
+      finit
+      mov [tmp], dword 0x3F800000 ; 1.0
+  
+      fld   dword [tmp]
+      fidiv dword [res]
+      fstp  dword [res]
+    .noneg:
+
+    mov eax, [res]
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+matrix_init__:
+    ;params
+    %define matrix      ebp+16
+    %define is_string   ebp+12
+    %define msize       ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define total     ebp-4
+    begin 4
+
+    cmp [is_string], dword 0
+    jnz .else
+      mov eax, [msize]
+      mov [total], eax
+      jmp .endif
+    .else:
+      mov eax, [msize]
+      mov ebx, 32 ;bits
+      mul ebx
+      mov [total], eax
+    .endif:
+  
+    mov eax, 0
+    .while:
+      cmp eax, [total]
+      jge .endwhile
+      mov ecx, [matrix]
+      add ecx, eax
+      mov [ecx], byte 0
+      inc eax
+      jmp .while
+    .endwhile:
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__matrix_cpy:
+    ;params
+    %define src       ebp+20
+    %define dest      ebp+16
+    %define is_string ebp+12
+    %define msize     ebp-8
+
+    ;local
+    %define total     ebp-4
+    begin 4
+
+    cmp [is_string], dword 0
+    jnz .else
+      mov eax, [msize]
+      mov [total], eax
+      jmp .endif
+    .else:
+      mov eax, [msize]
+      mov ebx, 32 ;bits
+      mul ebx
+      mov [total], eax
+    .endif:
+
+
+    mov eax, 0
+    .while:
+      cmp eax, [total]
+      jge .endwhile
+      mov ebx, [src]
+      add ebx, eax
+      mov ecx, [dest]
+      add ecx, eax
+      mov edx, [ecx]
+      mov [ecx], edx
+      inc eax
+      jmp .while
+    .endwhile:
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__strcpy:
+    ;params
+    %define src    ebp+12
+    %define dest   ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define src_len     ebp-4
+    begin 4
+
+    addarg dword [src]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+
+    mov [src_len], eax
+
+    cmp eax, [src_len]
+    jnz .end
+    
+    mov eax, 0
+    mov edx, [dest]
+    .while:
+      cmp eax, [src_len]
+      jge .endwhile
+
+      mov ebx, [src]
+      xor ecx, ecx
+      mov cl, [ebx+eax]
+
+      mov [edx+eax], cl
+
+      inc eax
+      jmp .while
+    .endwhile:
+
+    mov [edx+eax], byte 0
+
+    .end:
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+__strcmp:
+    ;params
+    %define left    ebp+12
+    %define right   ebp+8
+
+    ;local
+    %define left_len     ebp-4
+    %define l            ebp-8
+    %define r            ebp-12
+    begin 12
+
+    addarg dword [left]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+
+    mov [left_len], eax
+
+    addarg dword [right]
+    call __strlen
+    clargs 1
+
+    cmp eax, [left_len]
+    jnz .false
+
+    mov eax, 0
+    .while:
+      cmp eax, [left_len]
+      jge .endwhile
+
+      mov ebx, [left]
+      xor edx, edx
+      mov dl, [ebx+eax]
+
+      mov ebx, [right]
+      xor ecx, ecx
+      mov cl, [ebx+eax]
+      
+      cmp edx, ecx
+      jnz .false
+
+      inc eax
+      jmp .while
+    .endwhile:
+
+    mov eax, 1
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+  .false
+    mov eax, 0 
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__malloc:
+    ;params
+    %define size   ebp+8
+
+    begin 0
+
+    cmp [size], dword 0
+    jnz .alloc
+
+    mov eax, 0
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+    .alloc:
+      mov eax, __mem        ;base       +
+      add eax, [__mem_ptr]  ;allocated  +
+      add eax, [size]       ;requested  = new allocated chunk
+  
+      mov ebx,  __mem      ;base  +
+      add ebx, MEMORY_SIZE ;total  = chunk limit address
+
+      cmp eax, ebx
+      jg .no_memory_left
+
+      ;mreturn val
+      mov eax, __mem
+      add eax, [__mem_ptr]
+  
+      ;updates __mem_ptr
+      mov ebx, [__mem_ptr]
+      add ebx, [size]
+      mov [__mem_ptr], ebx
+
+      mreturn
+    
+   .no_memory_left:
+      addarg __str_no_mem_left
+      call __imprima_literal
+      clargs 1
+      exit 1
+
+__leia_caractere:
+    %define buffer   ebp-BUFFER_SIZE
+    begin BUFFER_SIZE
+    
+    ;read from stdin
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg BUFFER_SIZE
+    call __readline
+    clargs 2
+    
+    lea ebx, [buffer]
+    xor eax, eax
+    mov al, [ebx]
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__leia_real:
+    %define buffer   ebp-BUFFER_SIZE    
+    begin BUFFER_SIZE
+    
+    ;read from stdin
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg BUFFER_SIZE
+    call __readline
+    clargs 2
+    
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    call __atof
+    clargs 1
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__leia_inteiro:
+    %define buffer   ebp-BUFFER_SIZE
+    begin BUFFER_SIZE
+    
+    ;read from stdin
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg BUFFER_SIZE
+    call __readline
+    clargs 2
+    
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    call __atoi
+    clargs 1
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__leia_logico:
+    %define zero_str ebp-4
+    %define buffer   ebp-4-BUFFER_SIZE
+    begin (4+BUFFER_SIZE)
+    
+    mov [zero_str], dword 0x00000030 ;"0\0"
+
+    ;read from stdin
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg BUFFER_SIZE
+    call __readline
+    clargs 2
+
+    ;buffer == "falso"?
+    lea eax, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg __str_false
+    call __strcmp
+    clargs 2
+
+    cmp eax, 1
+    jz .false
+
+    ;buffer == "0"?
+    lea eax, [zero_str]
+    lea ebx, [buffer]
+    addarg eax
+    addarg ebx
+    call __strcmp
+    clargs 2
+
+    cmp eax, 1
+    jz .false
+
+    mov eax, 1
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+    .false:
+      mov eax, 0
+      mreturn
+mreturn
+__leia_literal:
+    %define string ebp-4
+    begin 4
+
+    addarg BUFFER_SIZE
+    call __malloc
+    clargs 1
+
+    mov [string], eax
+
+    addarg dword [string]
+    addarg BUFFER_SIZE
+    call __readline
+    clargs 2
+
+    mov eax, [string]
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+__readline:
+	%define STD_INPUT_HANDLE -10
+	
+    ;params
+    %define buffer   ebp+12
+    %define size     ebp+8
+
+    ;local    
+    %define handle ebp-4
+    %define read ebp-8
+    begin 4
+
+        
+	wcall	GetStdHandle, STD_INPUT_HANDLE
+	mov		[handle], eax
+
+	wcall ReadConsoleA , [handle], [buffer], 10, [read], 0
+	
+		
+	addarg eax
+	call __imprima_inteiro
+	clargs 1	
+	
+	addarg dword [buffer]
+	call __imprima_literal
+	clargs 1
+	exit 0
+
+    ;removes the \n
+    ;mov ebx, [buffer]
+    ;mov [ebx+eax-1], byte 0
+
+    mreturn
+mreturn
+	
+
+    ; --- [ IMPORTS MUST BE THE LAST PART OF PROGRAM ]
+
+;
+
+LAST_BEGIN
+
+__LIBS_         kernel32, 	"kernel32.dll"
+
+__IMPORT_       kernel32, \
+				GetStdHandle, "GetStdHandle",0, \
+				WriteConsoleA, "WriteConsoleA", 0, \
+				ExitProcess, "ExitProcess", 0, \
+				ReadConsoleA , "ReadConsoleA",0
+				
+LAST_END
\ No newline at end of file

Added: trunk/gpt2/test/cli_debugger.c
===================================================================
--- trunk/gpt2/test/cli_debugger.c	2007-10-30 13:05:32 UTC (rev 329)
+++ trunk/gpt2/test/cli_debugger.c	2007-10-30 19:23:58 UTC (rev 330)
@@ -0,0 +1,102 @@
+#include <stdio.h>
+#include <stdlib.h>
+#include <errno.h>
+#include <sys/socket.h>
+#include <netinet/in.h>
+#include <unistd.h> //close
+
+/*
+struct sockaddr_in
+  {
+      __SOCKADDR_COMMON (sin_);
+    in_port_t sin_port;           Port number.
+    struct in_addr sin_addr;            Internet address. (uint32) 
+
+        Pad to size of `struct sockaddr'. 
+        unsigned char sin_zero[sizeof (struct sockaddr) -
+	                           __SOCKADDR_COMMON_SIZE -
+				                              sizeof (in_port_t) -
+							                                 sizeof (struct in_addr)];
+											   };
+
+ */
+
+int create_server_socket(int port) {
+	int sock;
+  int on = 1;
+	struct sockaddr_in name;
+
+	sock = socket(PF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
+	if(sock < 0) {
+		printf("server: could not create socket\n");
+		exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
+	}
+
+  /* Enable address reuse */  
+  if( -1 == setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &on, sizeof(on) )) {//see http://www-128.ibm.com/developerworks/linux/library/l-sockpit/
+    printf("server: unable to set option\n");
+    exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
+  }
+
+	name.sin_family     = AF_INET;
+	name.sin_port       = htons(port);
+	name.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
+	
+	if(bind(sock, (struct sockaddr*)&name, sizeof(name)) < 0) {
+		printf("server: could not bind: %d\n", errno);
+		exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
+	}
+	return sock;
+}
+
+int main() {
+	int port = 7680;
+	int serversock;
+	int clientsock;
+	struct sockaddr_in clientname;
+	size_t size = 0;
+  char buffer[10000];
+	int received;
+
+
+  char* cmd_step_into = "step_into";
+  char* cmd_step_over = "step_over";
+  char* cmd_step_out =  "step_out";
+  char* cmd_continue =  "continue";
+  char* cmd_top =  "stop";
+
+	serversock = create_server_socket(port);
+	if(listen(serversock, 1) < 0) { //1: queue size for receiving connections
+		printf("server: error listening\n");
+		exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
+	}
+	
+  printf("waiting...\n");
+	clientsock = accept(serversock, (struct sockaddr*) &clientname, &size);
+	printf("server: connection accepted, addr size: %d\n", size);
+
+  while(1) {
+    printf("waiting for data...\n");
+    received = recv(clientsock, buffer, sizeof(buffer), 0);
+    if(received < 0) {
+      printf("error receiving\n");
+      exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
+    } else   if(received == 0) {
+      printf("no data received\n");
+      break;
+    } else {
+      printf("total pack: %d, data received: \n>>>\n%s\n<<<\n", received, buffer +1+ (strlen(buffer)*sizeof(char)));
+    }
+    printf("\n\n");
+
+    if(send(clientsock, cmd_step_into, sizeof(char)* (strlen(cmd_step_into)+1), 0) < 0) {//error
+      printf("client:error sending data\n");
+      break;
+    }
+  }
+
+	shutdown(clientsock, SHUT_RDWR);
+	shutdown(serversock, SHUT_RDWR); //CLOSE ALL	
+	close(clientsock);
+	close(serversock);
+}

Added: trunk/gpt2/test/error_tester.php
===================================================================
--- trunk/gpt2/test/error_tester.php	2007-10-30 13:05:32 UTC (rev 329)
+++ trunk/gpt2/test/error_tester.php	2007-10-30 19:23:58 UTC (rev 330)
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+#!/usr/local/bin/php
+
+<?
+	function print_source($src) {
+		$lines = explode("\n", $src);
+		$c = 1;
+		foreach($lines as $line) {
+			echo $c . " $line". "\n";
+			$c++;
+		}    
+		echo "--------\n";
+	}
+
+  $gpt = "/home/jester/projects/upis/trunk/pparser/debug/src/gpt";
+  $feedname = "feed_test";
+
+   if(!file_exists($feedname)) {
+     die("no file named $feedname\n");
+   }
+
+  $feed = file_get_contents($feedname);
+
+    
+  $matches = array();
+  preg_match_all("/<([^>]*)>/", $feed, $matches);
+//   print_r($matches);
+
+  $sources = $matches[1];
+
+  $char = '';
+  $idx = 0;
+  while(($char != 'q') && ($idx < count($sources))) {
+    system("clear");    
+    echo "Source idx: $idx\n\n";
+    print_source($sources[$idx]);
+    system("echo \"".$sources[$idx]."\" | $gpt -p ");
+    $char = trim(fgets(STDIN));
+
+    if(is_numeric($char) && ($char > 0) && ($char < count($sources))) {
+      $idx = $char;
+    } else if($char != 'b') {
+      $idx++;
+    } else {
+			$idx--;
+			if($idx < 0) $idx = 0;
+		}
+  }	
+?>

Added: trunk/gpt2/test/tester.gpt
===================================================================
--- trunk/gpt2/test/tester.gpt	2007-10-30 13:05:32 UTC (rev 329)
+++ trunk/gpt2/test/tester.gpt	2007-10-30 19:23:58 UTC (rev 330)
@@ -0,0 +1,548 @@
+/* algoritmo para testar comportamento da linguagem */
+/* Nota: nao testar errors de compilacao aqui */
+
+algoritmo tester;
+
+vari?veis
+  i : inteiro;
+  r : real;
+  l : l?gico;
+  c : caractere;
+  str : literal;  
+  mat: matriz[2] de inteiros;
+fim-vari?veis
+
+in?cio
+  testar_inicializacao();
+  testar_expr_aritm();
+  testar_expr_log();
+
+  testar_matriz_carac();
+  testar_matriz_literais();  
+  testar_enquanto();
+  testar_para();
+
+
+  testar_funcoes();
+
+//overflow de inteiros, caracteres logicos e reais
+  //testar_overflow();
+
+//testar_castings();
+
+fim
+
+fun??o testar_inicializacao()
+  local : inteiro;
+in?cio
+  se i <> 0 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: i <> 0");
+  fim-se
+
+  se r <> 0 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: r <> 0");
+  fim-se
+
+  se r <> 0.0 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: r <> 0.0");
+  fim-se
+
+  se l <> 0 ent?o 
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: l <> 0");
+  fim-se
+
+  se l <> falso ent?o
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: l <> falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se str <> "" ent?o
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: str <> \"\"");
+  fim-se
+
+  se local <> 0 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: local <> 0");
+  fim-se
+
+  para local de 0 at? 1 fa?a  
+    se mat[local] <> 0 ent?o
+      imprima("testar_inicializacao: mat[",local,"] <> 0");
+    fim-se
+  fim-para
+
+  se local <> 1 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_inicializacao: local <> 2");
+  fim-se  
+fim
+
+fun??o testar_expr_aritm()
+in?cio
+
+  se verdadeiro ent?o
+    //
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: se verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se falso ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: se falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o verdadeiro ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: se n?o verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+    
+  se 2 + 2 ent?o
+    //ok
+  sen?o  
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 2 + 2");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 2 - 2 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 2 - 2");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 2 + 2 <> 4 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 2 + 2 <> 4");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (2 - 2) ent?o
+    //
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: se n?o (2-2)");  
+  fim-se
+
+  se 10 + 2 * 3 <> 16 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 10 + 2 * 3 <> 16");
+  fim-se
+  
+  se 10 + 2 * 3 - 12 / 3 <> 12 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 10 + 2 * 3 - 12 / 3 <> 12");
+  fim-se
+
+  se (10 + 2) * (12 - 10) / 3 <> 8 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: (10 + 2) * (12 - 10) / 3 <> 8");
+  fim-se
+  
+  se 0b101 <> 5 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 0b101 <> 5");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 0xA <> 10 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 0xA <> 10");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 0c10 <> 8 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 0c10 <> 8");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 10 * -1 <> -10 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 10 * -1 <> -10");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 10 - 5.5 <> 4.5 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 10 - 5.5 <> 4.5");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 5.5 - 1 <> 4.5 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 5.5 - 1 <> 4.5");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 5.5 * 2 <> 11 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 5.5 * 2 <> 11");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 2 * 5.5  <> 11 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 2 * 5.5  <> 11");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 1 + 2 * 5.5  <> 12 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 1 + 2 * 5.5  <> 12");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 1 + 5.5 * 2 <> 12 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 1 + 5.5 * 2 <> 12");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 5 / 2 <> 2 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 5 / 2 <> 2");
+  fim-se
+  
+  se 5.0 / 2 <> 2.5 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 5.0 / 2 <> 2.5");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 1 + 5.0 / 2 <> 3.5 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 1 + 5.0 / 2 <> 3.5");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 1 > 2 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 1 > 2");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 1 >= 2 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 1 >= 2");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 1 >= 1 ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 1 >= 1");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 2 < 1 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 2 < 1");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 2 <= 1 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 2 <= 1");
+  fim-se
+
+  se 2 <= 2 ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_aritm: 2 <= 1");
+  fim-se
+
+fim
+
+fun??o testar_expr_log()
+in?cio
+  se verdadeiro e verdadeiro ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: verdadeiro e verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se verdadeiro e falso ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: verdadeiro e falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se falso e verdadeiro ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: falso e verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se falso e falso ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: falso e falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se verdadeiro ou verdadeiro ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: verdadeiro ou verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se verdadeiro ou falso ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: verdadeiro ou falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se falso ou verdadeiro ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: falso ou verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se falso ou falso ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: falso ou falso");
+  fim-se
+
+
+  //not
+  se n?o (verdadeiro e verdadeiro) ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o verdadeiro e verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (verdadeiro e falso) ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o verdadeiro e falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (falso e verdadeiro) ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o falso e verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (falso e falso) ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o falso e falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (verdadeiro ou verdadeiro) ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o verdadeiro ou verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (verdadeiro ou falso) ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o verdadeiro ou falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (falso ou verdadeiro) ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o falso ou verdadeiro");
+  fim-se
+
+  se n?o (falso ou falso) ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: n?o falso ou falso");
+  fim-se
+
+  //operadores binarios &, |, ^
+
+  se (5 & 0b100) <> 4 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: 5 & 0b100 <> 4");
+  fim-se
+
+  //<> maior precedencia que |
+  se 0b101 | 2 <> 7 ent?o
+  sen?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: 0b101 | 2 <> 7");
+  fim-se
+
+  se (0b101 | 2) <> 7 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: 0b101 | 2 <> 7");
+  fim-se
+
+  se (0b1011 ^ 0b0101) <> 14 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: (0b1011 ^ 0b0101) <> 14");
+  fim-se
+
+  se ~4 <> -5 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_expr_log: ~4 <> -5");
+  fim-se
+fim
+
+
+fun??o testar_matriz_carac()
+  gg: matriz[2][3] de caracteres;
+  i,j: inteiro;
+in?cio  
+
+  para i de 0 at? 1 fa?a
+    para j de 0 at? 2 fa?a      
+      se gg[i][j] <> '' ou  gg[i][j] <> 0 ent?o
+        imprima("testar_matriz_carac: gg[i][j] <> \"\"");
+      fim-se
+      c := c + 1;
+    fim-para
+  fim-para
+
+  gg[0][0] := 'a';
+  gg[0][1] := 'b';
+  gg[0][2] := 'c';
+  gg[1][0] := 'd';
+  gg[1][1] := 'e';
+  gg[1][2] := 'f';
+
+  matriz_carac_func(gg);
+fim
+
+fun??o matriz_carac_func(qq: matriz[2][3] de caracteres)
+  cp : matriz[6] de caracteres;
+  i : inteiro;
+  j : inteiro;
+  c : inteiro;
+in?cio  
+  cp[0] := 'a';
+  cp[1] := 'b';
+  cp[2] := 'c';
+  cp[3] := 'd';
+  cp[4] := 'e';
+  cp[5] := 'f';
+
+  para i de 0 at? 1 fa?a
+    para j de 0 at? 2 fa?a      
+      se qq[i][j] <> cp[c] ent?o        
+        imprima("matriz_carac_func: qq[i][j] <> cp[c]");
+      fim-se
+      c := c + 1;
+    fim-para
+  fim-para
+
+fim
+
+fun??o testar_matriz_literais()
+  gg : matriz[2][3] de literais;
+  i,j: inteiro;
+in?cio
+
+  para i de 0 at? 1 fa?a
+    para j de 0 at? 2 fa?a
+      se gg[i][j] <> "" ent?o
+        imprima("testar_matriz_literais: gg[i][j] <> \"\"");
+      fim-se
+      c := c + 1;
+    fim-para
+  fim-para
+
+  gg[0][0] := "oi1";
+  gg[0][1] := "oi2";
+  gg[0][2] := "oi3";
+  gg[1][0] := "oi4";
+  gg[1][1] := "oi5";
+  gg[1][2] := "oi6";
+
+  matriz_lit_func(gg);
+fim
+
+fun??o matriz_lit_func(qq: matriz[2][3] de literais)
+  cp : matriz[6] de literais;
+  i : inteiro;
+  j : inteiro;
+  c : inteiro;
+in?cio
+  cp[0] := "oi1";
+  cp[1] := "oi2";
+  cp[2] := "oi3";
+  cp[3] := "oi4";
+  cp[4] := "oi5";
+  cp[5] := "oi6";
+
+  para i de 0 at? 1 fa?a
+    para j de 0 at? 2 fa?a
+      se qq[i][j] <> cp[c] ent?o
+        imprima("testar_matriz_literais: qq[i][j] <> cp[c]");
+      fim-se
+      c := c + 1;
+    fim-para
+  fim-para
+
+fim
+
+fun??o testar_enquanto()
+  local : inteiro;
+  z : inteiro;
+in?cio
+
+  enquanto n?o local fa?a
+    
+    se z = 0 ent?o
+      z := 1;    
+    fim-se
+  
+    se z = 1 ent?o
+      local := 1;
+    fim-se
+  fim-enquanto
+
+  se local <> 1 ou z <> 1 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_enquanto: local <> 1 e z <> 1");
+  fim-se
+fim
+
+fun??o testar_para()
+  str : inteiro; //shadow global str
+  g : inteiro;
+in?cio
+
+  para str de 0 at? 4 fa?a
+    g := g + str;
+  fim-para
+
+  se g <> 10 ou str <> 4 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_para: g <> 10 ou str <> 4");
+  fim-se
+
+  g := 0;
+  para str de 0 at? 10 passo 2 fa?a
+    g := g + str;
+  fim-para
+
+  se g <> 30 ou str <> 10 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_para: g <> 30 ou str <> 10");
+  fim-se
+  
+  g := 30;
+  para str de 10 at? 0 passo -2 fa?a
+    g := g - str;
+  fim-para  
+
+  se g <> 0 ou str <> 0 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_para: g <> 0 ou str <> 0");
+  fim-se
+fim
+
+
+
+fun??o testar_funcoes()
+  lit : literal;
+  mm  : matriz[2] de inteiros;
+  i : inteiro;
+  r : real;
+in?cio
+  mm[0] := -7;
+  mm[1] := -8;
+
+  lit := f(13, 5.5, mm, 'a');
+  se lit <> "ok" ent?o
+    imprima("testar_funcoes: lit <> \"oi\"");
+  fim-se
+
+  se mm[0] = 99 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_funcoes: mm[0] = 99");
+  fim-se
+
+  se mm[0] <> -7 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_funcoes: mm[0] <> -7");
+  fim-se
+
+  mm[0] := 0;
+  mm[1] := 0;
+  lit := f(1,0, mm, 0);
+
+  se lit <> "ret" ent?o
+    imprima("testar_funcoes: lit <> \"ret\"");
+  fim-se
+
+  r := f2(2.6);
+
+  i := r + 0.5;
+  se i <> 6 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_funcoes: i <> 6");
+  fim-se
+
+  i := f2(2.6);
+  se i <> 5 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_funcoes: i <> 5");
+  fim-se
+
+  r := f3();
+  se r <> 99 ent?o
+    imprima("testar_funcoes: r <> 99");
+  fim-se
+
+  f2('\n'-8);
+  f4(2);
+fim
+
+fun??o f(x:inteiro, r:real, m: matriz[2] de inteiros, c: caractere) : literal
+  count : inteiro;
+in?cio
+  count := x + r + m[0] + m[1] + c + 0.5;
+  
+  se count = 1 ent?o
+    retorne "ret";
+  fim-se
+    
+  se count <> 101 ent?o
+    imprima("f: count <> 101");
+  fim-se
+
+  m[0] := 99;
+
+  retorne "ok";
+fim
+
+fun??o f2(x: inteiro) : real
+in?cio
+  se x <> 2 ent?o
+    imprima("f2: x <> 2");
+  fim-se
+
+  retorne 5.6;
+fim
+
+fun??o f3() : inteiro
+in?cio
+  retorne 99;
+fim
+
+fun??o f4(r:real)
+in?cio
+  se r <> 2 ent?o
+    imprima("f4: r <> 2");
+  fim-se
+fim
+

- Compilador converte Hello World em portugol para GptAssembly
  corretamente

  do projeto HoloVM

  de argumentos na chamada de subrotinas. Por enquanto imprima
  esta sendo tratada como um caso "especial".
- Formato do arquivo GptAssembly agora esta correto e mais legivel

+#include "PortugolParserTokenTypes.hpp"
+
 #include "Tools.hpp"
 
 
@@ -233,3 +235,20 @@
 
      return !stream.eof();
 }
+
+
+const string typeToText(const int &type)
+{
+   if (type == PortugolParserTokenTypes::T_INT_LIT) {
+      return "int";
+   } else if (type == PortugolParserTokenTypes::T_CARAC_LIT) {
+      return "carac lit ???";
+   } else if (type == PortugolParserTokenTypes::T_STRING_LIT) {
+      return "string";
+   } else if (type == PortugolParserTokenTypes::T_IDENTIFICADOR) {
+      return "id";
+   }
+
+   return "ERRO !!!";
+}
+

+    x := 20;
+    se x >= 0 ent?o
+        se x > 40 ent?o
+            imprima( "x>40" );
+        sen?o
+            imprima( "x<=40" );
+        fim-se
+    sen?o
+        imprima( "x eh negativo !!!" );
+    fim-se
+fim

+// Fun??es recursivas
+
+algoritmo fatorial_recursivo;
+
+vari?vel x: inteiro;
+
+in?cio
+    imprima( "Digite um n?mero:" );
+    x := leia( );
+    imprima( "Fatorial de ", x, "? ", fatorial( x ) );
+fim
+
+fun??o fatorial( z: inteiro ) : inteiro
+in?cio
+    se z = 1 ent?o
+        retorne 1;
+    sen?o
+        retorne z * fatorial( z - 1 );
+    fim-se
+fim

Added: trunk/gpt2/test/wikki/procedimentos_definidos_usuario_3.gpt
===================================================================
--- trunk/gpt2/test/wikki/procedimentos_definidos_usuario_3.gpt	2007-10-31 13:22:29 UTC (rev 331)
+++ trunk/gpt2/test/wikki/procedimentos_definidos_usuario_3.gpt	2007-10-31 13:25:47 UTC (rev 332)
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+// Procedimento com passagem de par?metros por valor
+algoritmo exemplo;
+
+vari?vel g: inteiro;
+
+in?cio
+    g := 0;
+    g := g;
+    roda( g, 10 );
+fim
+
+procedimento roda( p1: inteiro, p2: inteiro )
+vari?vel l1: inteiro;
+vari?vel l2: inteiro;
+in?cio
+    l1 := 0;
+    l1 := l2;
+    l1 := g;
+    g := l1;
+    p1 := p2;
+    l1 := p1;
+    p1 := l1;
+    p1 := g;
+    g := p1;
+    imprima( g, p1, l1 );
+fim

+// Vari?veis globais sendo acessadas em um procedimento com par?metros
+algoritmo exemplo;
+
+vari?veis
+    x: inteiro;
+    y: inteiro;
+fim-vari?veis
+
+in?cio
+    x := 10;
+    y := 20;
+    soma( 30 );
+fim
+
+procedimento soma( z: inteiro )
+vari?vel s: inteiro;
+in?cio
+    s := x + y + z;
+    imprima( "A soma de x, y e z ?: ", s );
+fim

+    imprima( s );
+fim
+

+in?cio
+    r := v1 + v2;
+fim

+

+    imprima( x );
+fim
+

+in?cio
+    proc2( r1, v11, v12 );
+fim
+

+    imprima( v );
+fim

@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+algoritmo exemplo;
+
+vari?vel v: l?gico;
+
+in?cio
+    // testes com l?gico
+    v := verdadeiro;
+    v := falso;
+    v := v;
+    imprima( verdadeiro );
+    imprima( falso );
+    imprima( v );
+fim

+
+in?cio
+    mostra( );
+fim
+
+procedimento mostra( )
+vari?vel resultado: inteiro;
+in?cio
+    resultado := 4 + 5;
+    imprima( "soma de 4 e 5 ?: ", resultado );
+fim

+
+vari?veis
+    l: literal;
+    c: caractere;
+fim-vari?veis
+
